title: lehmann natur - on the way to a better agriculture.
description: lehmann natur is an importer and producer of premium organic and Demeter certified fruit and vegetables as well as a pioneer in permaculture.
cleaned_text: For the environment the better cultivation, the healthier soil, the healthier plant, and therefore the healthier product. Permaculture is our answer to climate change! We are organic for more than 30 years. Through our connection to Demeter, we promote biodynamic cultivation among our producers. We guarantee to deliver the best quality that nature has to offer.
